TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VirtualizingPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel
Public MustInherit Class VirtualizingPanel Inherits Panel
public ref class VirtualizingPanel abstract : System::Windows::Controls::Panel

summary.span: 为虚拟化其子数据集合的 元素提供一个框架。

span.span: Provides a framework for elements that virtualize their child data collection.

summary.span: 这是一个抽象类。

span.span: This is an abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此上下文中，"虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成的更多的数据基于哪些项目是在屏幕上可见的项。In this context, "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on the screen. 它是需要占用大量内存和处理器，生成大量的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]时在给定时间只有少量可能在屏幕上，对于元素。It is intensive, both in terms of memory and processor, to generate a large number of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few may be on the screen at a given time. 继承自一个面板，如、 计算可见项，并处理从(如或) 仅创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]可见项的元素.A panel that inherits from , such as the , calculates visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to only create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements for visible items. 以下列表描述了事例时无法虚拟化项容器：The following lists describes cases when the cannot virtualize item containers: - 包含不同类型的项容器。The contains item containers of different types. 例如，可能必须使用这两项和对象作为项容器。For example, a might have items that use both and objects as the item containers. - 显式创建到项容器。You explicitly create the item containers to the . 有关显式和隐式创建项容器的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about explicitly versus implicitly creating item containers, see the class. 当是虚拟化项容器，你可能需要保存与容器，而不是具有自身的数据项关联的状态信息。When a is virtualizing item containers, you may need to save state information that is associated with a container instead of with the data item itself. 例如，如果项包含在控件，状态绑定到的项容器，而不适用于数据项本身。For example, if an item is contained by an control, the state is bound to the item container, and not to the data item itself. 当的一个新的项的当前值将重复使用用于新项。When the is reused for a new item, the current value of is used for the new item. 此外，旧项不会保留其值。In addition, the old item does not retain its value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用派生类中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example demonstrates how to use the derived class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[virtualizingstackpanel_intro#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置虚拟化 时，视区前后缓存的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the cache before and after the viewport when the is virtualizing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存是视区（其中的项未虚拟化）上方或下方的空间量。The cache is the amount of space above or below the viewport in which items are not virtualized. 使用缓存来避免生成[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素如会将它们滚动到视图。Use a cache to avoid generating [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements as they’re scrolled into view. 属性确定使用的度量单位。The property determines the unit of measurement that is used by .

span.span: Get or sets a value that indicates whether this should virtualize an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 面板和控件对象项容器上使用此属性来跟踪时的容器可以和不能进行虚拟化。Panel and Control objects use this property on item containers to track when the container can and cannot be virtualized.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty IsContainerVirtualizableProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly IsContainerVirtualizableProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 正在虚拟化其子集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates that this is virtualizing its child collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. "虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成的更多的数据基于屏幕上所显示的项的项。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]时在屏幕上可能只有少量元素，元素可以对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 例如，计算可见项的数量，并处理从(如或) 来创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。For example, the calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将绑定到 XML 数据源和虚拟化中显示的项元素中的使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to bind to an XML data source and virtualize the items displayed in a element by using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 请注意，附加的属性显式设置为`true`。Notice that the attached property is explicitly set to `true`. [!code-xml[VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. 在此上下文中，"虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成的更多的数据基于哪些项目是在屏幕上可见的项。In this context, "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on the screen. 它是需要占用大量内存和处理器，生成大量的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]时在给定时间只有少量可能在屏幕上，对于元素。It is intensive, both in terms of memory and processor, to generate a large number of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few may be on the screen at a given time.

summary.span: 获取或设置 中的面板虚拟化其子项的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how a panel in an virtualizes its child items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，创建每个可见的项的项容器，并在不再需要 （例如当项滚动出视野之外） 时将其丢弃。By default, a creates an item container for each visible item and discards it when it is no longer needed (such as when the item is scrolled out of view). 当包含大量的项，创建并放弃项容器的过程性能产生负面影响。When an contains a lot of items, the process of creating and discarding item containers can negatively affect performance. 当设置为，则重用项容器改为创建一个新的每次。When is set to , the reuses item containers instead of creating a new one each time. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，并设置附加属性设置为。The following example creates a and sets the attached property to . [!code-xml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#VirtualizationMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#virtualizationmode)] 下面的示例演示使用上一示例中的数据。The following example shows the data used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#listboxdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#listboxdata)]
